name: Cat Root | Global Game Jam 2023 Entry
name_original: Cat Root | Global Game Jam 2023 Entry
description:
Cat Root is a side scrolling platformer where player has to find the water source in order to water the vegetables.

Platform: PC

Control: -WASD to move -Space to jump

Developed by: Shamit Ahmed

Jam Submission: https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/cat-root-8

Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/shamitahmed
